dt.t: Mayberg has been mapping {wi}anatomical{/wi} areas of the brain that are either hyperactive or inactive in depressed men and women.

Diabetes mellitus is characterized by a broad array of physiologic and {wi}anatomic{/wi} abnormalities, but its most notable feature is disturbed glucose metabolism, which results in inappropriate hyperglycemia.
